013package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.reflect.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.function.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteOp;
028import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
032
033/**
034 * Contains the meta-data about a Java method on a REST proxy class.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * Captures the information in {@link RemoteOp @RemoteOp} annotations for caching and reuse.
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
040 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../index.html#jrc.Proxies">REST Proxies</a>
041 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../index.html#juneau-rest-client">juneau-rest-client</a>
042 * </ul>
043 */
044public class RemoteOperationMeta {
045
046   private final String httpMethod;
047   private final String fullPath;
048   private final RemoteOperationArg[] pathArgs, queryArgs, headerArgs, formDataArgs;
049   private final RemoteOperationBeanArg[] requestArgs;
050   private final RemoteOperationArg contentArg;
051   private final RemoteOperationReturn methodReturn;
052   private final Class<?>[] exceptions;
053
054   /**
055    * Constructor.
056    *
057    * @param parentPath The absolute URI of the REST interface backing the interface proxy.
058    * @param m The Java method.
059    * @param defaultMethod The default HTTP method if not specified through annotation.
060    */
061   public RemoteOperationMeta(final String parentPath, Method m, String defaultMethod) {
062      Builder b = new Builder(parentPath, m, defaultMethod);
063      this.httpMethod = b.httpMethod;
064      this.fullPath = b.fullPath;
065      this.pathArgs = b.pathArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.pathArgs.size()]);
066      this.queryArgs = b.queryArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.queryArgs.size()]);
067      this.formDataArgs = b.formDataArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.formDataArgs.size()]);
068      this.headerArgs = b.headerArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.headerArgs.size()]);
069      this.requestArgs = b.requestArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationBeanArg[b.requestArgs.size()]);
070      this.contentArg = b.bodyArg;
071      this.methodReturn = b.methodReturn;
072      this.exceptions = m.getExceptionTypes();
073   }
074
075   private static final class Builder {
076      String httpMethod, fullPath, path;
077      List<RemoteOperationArg>
078         pathArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
079         queryArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
080         headerArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
081         formDataArgs = new LinkedList<>();
082      List<RemoteOperationBeanArg>
083         requestArgs = new LinkedList<>();
084      RemoteOperationArg bodyArg;
085      RemoteOperationReturn methodReturn;
086
087      Builder(String parentPath, Method m, String defaultMethod) {
088
089         MethodInfo mi = MethodInfo.of(m);
090
091         AnnotationList al = mi.getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
092         if (al.isEmpty())
093            al = mi.getReturnType().unwrap(Value.class,Optional.class).getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
094
095         Value<String> _httpMethod = Value.empty(), _path = Value.empty();
096         al.stream().map(x -> x.getName().substring(6).toUpperCase()).filter(x -> ! x.equals("OP")).forEach(x -> _httpMethod.set(x));
097         al.forEachValue(String.class, "method", NOT_EMPTY, x -> _httpMethod.set(x.trim().toUpperCase()));
098         al.forEachValue(String.class, "path", NOT_EMPTY, x-> _path.set(x.trim()));
099         httpMethod = _httpMethod.orElse("").trim();
100         path = _path.orElse("").trim();
101
102         Value<String> value = Value.empty();
103         al.forEach(RemoteOp.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.inner().value().trim()), x -> value.set(x.inner().value().trim()));
104
105         if (value.isPresent()) {
106            String v = value.get();
107            int i = v.indexOf(' ');
108            if (i == -1) {
109               httpMethod = v;
110            } else {
111               httpMethod = v.substring(0, i).trim();
112               path = v.substring(i).trim();
113            }
114         } else {
115            al.forEach(x -> ! x.isType(RemoteOp.class) && isNotEmpty(x.getValue(String.class, "value", NOT_EMPTY).orElse("").trim()),x -> value.set(x.getValue(String.class, "value", NOT_EMPTY).get().trim()));
116            if (value.isPresent())
117               path = value.get();
118         }
119
120         if (path.isEmpty()) {
121            path = HttpUtils.detectHttpPath(m, Utils.nullIfEmpty3(httpMethod));
122         }
123         if (httpMethod.isEmpty())
124            httpMethod = HttpUtils.detectHttpMethod(m, true, defaultMethod);
125
126         path = trimSlashes(path);
127
128         if (! isOneOf(httpMethod, "DELETE", "GET", "POST", "PUT", "OPTIONS", "HEAD", "CONNECT", "TRACE", "PATCH"))
129            throw new RemoteMetadataException(m,
130               "Invalid value specified for @RemoteOp(httpMethod) annotation: '"+httpMethod+"'.  Valid values are [DELETE,GET,POST,PUT,OPTIONS,HEAD,CONNECT,TRACE,PATCH].");
131
132         methodReturn = new RemoteOperationReturn(mi);
133
134         fullPath = path.indexOf("://") != -1 ? path : (parentPath.isEmpty() ? urlEncodePath(path) : (trimSlashes(parentPath) + '/' + urlEncodePath(path)));
135
136         mi.getParams().forEach(x -> {
137            RemoteOperationArg rma = RemoteOperationArg.create(x);
138            if (rma != null) {
139               HttpPartType pt = rma.getPartType();
140               if (pt == HEADER)
141                  headerArgs.add(rma);
142               else if (pt == QUERY)
143                  queryArgs.add(rma);
144               else if (pt == FORMDATA)
145                  formDataArgs.add(rma);
146               else if (pt == PATH)
147                  pathArgs.add(rma);
148               else
149                  bodyArg = rma;
150            }
151            RequestBeanMeta rmba = RequestBeanMeta.create(x, AnnotationWorkList.create());
152            if (rmba != null) {
153               requestArgs.add(new RemoteOperationBeanArg(x.getIndex(), rmba));
154            }
155         });
156      }
157   }
158
159   /**
160    * Returns the value of the {@link RemoteOp#method() @RemoteOp(method)} annotation on this Java method.
161    *
162    * @return The value of the annotation, never <jk>null</jk>.
163    */
164   public String getHttpMethod() {
165      return httpMethod;
166   }
167
168   /**
169    * Returns the absolute URI of the REST interface invoked by this Java method.
170    *
171    * @return The absolute URI of the REST interface, never <jk>null</jk>.
172    */
173   public String getFullPath() {
174      return fullPath;
175   }
176
177   /**
178    * Performs an action on the {@link Path @Path} annotated arguments on this Java method.
179    *
180    * @param action The action to perform.
181    * @return This object.
182    */
183   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachPathArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
184      for (RemoteOperationArg a : pathArgs)
185         action.accept(a);
186      return this;
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Performs an action on the {@link Query @Query} annotated arguments on this Java method.
191    *
192    * @param action The action to perform.
193    * @return This object.
194    */
195   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachQueryArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
196      for (RemoteOperationArg a : queryArgs)
197         action.accept(a);
198      return this;
199   }
200
201   /**
202    * Performs an action on the {@link FormData @FormData} annotated arguments on this Java method.
203    *
204    * @param action The action to perform.
205    * @return This object.
206    */
207   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachFormDataArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
208      for (RemoteOperationArg a : formDataArgs)
209         action.accept(a);
210      return this;
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Performs an action on the {@link Header @Header} annotated arguments on this Java method.
215    *
216    * @param action The action to perform.
217    * @return This object.
218    */
219   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachHeaderArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
220      for (RemoteOperationArg a : headerArgs)
221         action.accept(a);
222      return this;
223   }
224
225   /**
226    * Performs an action on the {@link Request @Request} annotated arguments on this Java method.
227    *
228    * @param action The action to perform.
229    * @return This object.
230    */
231   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachRequestArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationBeanArg> action) {
232      for (RemoteOperationBeanArg a : requestArgs)
233         action.accept(a);
234      return this;
235   }
236
237   /**
238    * Returns the argument annotated with {@link Content @Content}.
239    *
240    * @return A index of the argument with the {@link Content @Content} annotation, or <jk>null</jk> if no argument exists.
241    */
242   public RemoteOperationArg getContentArg() {
243      return contentArg;
244   }
245
246   /**
247    * Returns whether the method returns the HTTP response body or status code.
248    *
249    * @return Whether the method returns the HTTP response body or status code.
250    */
251   public RemoteOperationReturn getReturns() {
252      return methodReturn;
253   }
254
255   /**
256    * Performs an action on the exceptions thrown by this method.
257    *
258    * @param action The action to perform.
259    * @return This object.
260    */
261   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachException(Consumer<Class<?>> action) {
262      for (Class<?> e : exceptions)
263         action.accept(e);
264      return this;
265   }
266}
